price: (91) Now? And you had disobeyed [Him] before and were of the corrupters?
arabic: ءَآلۡـَٰٔنَ وَقَدۡ عَصَيۡتَ قَبۡلُ وَكُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: āl'āna waqad ʿaṣayta qablu wakunta mina al-muf'sidīna
